news.item: Supertux 0.1.1 now has binaries for Windows and Mac OS X 10.3.x as well as an autopackage installer in our download section.

SuperTux 0.1.1 is out, still the same game as 0.1.0, features however a much improved font, some minor bugfixes and finally a build in editor. A Win32 build is available as well, you can get it in the download section.
Windows Binary for SuperTux is released, go to the download section to download it.
SuperTux Milestone1, aka 0.1.0 as been released, featuring 26 levels, a worldmap and completly reworked graphics, go to the download section to download it.
